channel.title: FrozenAge - Bork - Barrelchest - 100% Slayer & More
channel.description:
[CENTER][URL=http://frozenage.org/][IMG]http://frozenage.org/FrozenAge.png[/img][/URL]
[URL=http://frozenage.org/client/FrozenAge.jar][IMG]http://frozenage.org/images/Play_Now.png[/img][/URL]
[B][COLOR=RoyalBlue]Features[/COLOR][/B]
[COLOR=#d8ccaf][B]Combat[/B][/COLOR] Equipment requirements Equipment weights Equipment degrading
[COLOR=#468f4d][B]Skilling[/B][/COLOR] [COLOR=#564b3a][B]100% Agility[/B][/COLOR] [COLOR=#7b6709][B]100% Cooking[/B][/COLOR] [COLOR=#757b7c][B]100% Fishing[/B][/COLOR] [COLOR=#72420a][B]100% Crafting[/B][/COLOR] [COLOR=#247b09][B]100% Fletching[/B][/COLOR] [COLOR=#dd4f01][B]100% Firemaking[/B][/COLOR] [COLOR=#00a900][B]100% Herblore[/B][/COLOR] [COLOR=#a79a99][B]100% Farming[/B][/COLOR] [COLOR=#757b7c][B]100% Mining[/B][/COLOR] [COLOR=#555b5a][B]100% Smithing[/B][/COLOR] [COLOR=#1b0692][B]90% Modern magic, 100% Ancient magicks[/B][/COLOR] [COLOR=#9db9a7][B]100% Prayer[/B][/COLOR] [COLOR=#8b3709][B]100% Runecrafting[/B][/COLOR] [COLOR=purple][B]80% Thieving[/B][/COLOR] [COLOR=#000000][B]100% Slayer[/B][/COLOR] [COLOR=#096c02][B]100% Woodcutting ( + bird nests)[/B][/COLOR]
[COLOR=#cb5150][B]Minigames[/B][/COLOR] Barrows Duel Arena Staking Preset saving / loading Previous stake loading
Fight caves Fight pits Treasure Trails Warriors Guild
Animating armour Keg balancing Shot put Attack dummies Defender drops
Puro-Puro
Pest Control RS-Like Rewards
[COLOR=#bba781][B]Miscellaneous[/B][/COLOR] Skill requirement menus (WIP) Entity (NPC & Player) following Wilderness obelisks Teleportation items Amulet of glory Ring of duelling Games necklace Skills necklace Combat bracelet 24/7 uptime Frequent updates Highscores [B]Bork[/B] [B]Barrelchest[/B] [B]God wars[/B] & Many more bosses Training zones (low, medium, high level) Skilling teleports "Black key" drop from KBD for items XP Drops Client graphics options (fixed, resizable, full screen) Client advanced options (toggle options such as orbs, remaining xp, roofs, etc) Achievement diaries (Global and Lumbridge / Draynor and many more to come!) Quick prayers Full clan chat Mousewheel dragging / zooming [B]Sounds[/B] [B]Regional music[/B] Private chat notification timers Ectofuntus worshipping Offering bones to the gods on an altar Full Jewellery smithing Barcrawl mini-quest [B]... And much more![/B]
[B][COLOR=RoyalBlue]Media[/COLOR][/B]
